description: Erection of single storey outbuilding with solar panels
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The outbuilding shall be used as an ancillary use to the main house, and not to be used as a separate unit.  </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Any alternative use of the building hereby approved will require written approval by the local planning authority.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d382df7a-7fff-0dca-b7c7-2a6afda238e4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of neighbouring residential amenities.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The rated aggregate noise level from the music studio, hereby approved, shall be 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the façade of the nearest noise-sensitive premises and 5 dB(A) or more from the façade of the nearest office. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to first use/occupation, a scheme for sound insulation measures and a noise test assessment shall be carried out in accordance with BS4142:2014 'Rating industrial noise affecting mixed residential and industrial areas' and shall be submitted to the local planning authority for approval in writing.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-614ede3c-7fff-b45d-5349-76098f19d5f2"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation, full details of the planting scheme illustrated on the approved drawings shall be submitted to the local planning authority for approval in writing. The scheme shall show the type of plant/shrubbery species, and the amount of individual plants, and shall be carried out and implemented on site within a period of four months from the date of this approval and shall be maintained to the satisfaction of the local planning authority, such maintenance is to include the replacement of any plants that die, or are severely damaged, seriously diseased, or removed.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To ensure that there is no loss of urban greening and to help with biodiversity, leading to a net gain. </span></p>

<p style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-cf5b44a7-7fff-2913-0203-5f089dcbd107"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Full details, and photo samples naming the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-af6bda35-7fff-0cae-b78a-bcb4af38800c"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area</span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">.</span></p>
